Terms of Use
By using %s (“the Application”) in your vehicle, you agree to the following terms:

Personal Responsibility: You acknowledge that you are solely responsible for your use of the Application while in a vehicle. You agree not to hold the developers, distributors, or any affiliated parties liable for any distractions, accidents, damages, or injuries that may result from your use of the Application.

Safe Usage: You agree to actively use the Application only when the vehicle is not in motion or if you are a passenger. The driver should not interact with the Application while the vehicle is moving. Using the Application while driving can be distracting and is strongly discouraged.

Compliance with Laws: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding the use of electronic devices while operating a vehicle.
By proceeding, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by these terms and conditions.
